page.title: 05CROWLE FIRE BRIGADE
page.content: CROWLE FIRE BRIGADE IS PART OF THE {HUMBERSIDE FIRE SERVICE.}THERE ARE THIRTEEN FIREMEN IN CROWLE FIRE SERVICE.APART FROM FIRE CALLS,THEY GET CALLED OUT FOR{ANIMAL RESCUE}, PUMPING WATER AFTER{FLOODS}AND{TRAFFIC {ACCIDENTS}.SIX MEN ARE ALLOWED TO GO OUT ON AN EMERGENCY CALL.THEY CARRY RADIO PAGERS WITH THEM.THE LARGEST FIRE THAT CROWLE FIRE SERVICE ATTENDED WAS THE{NYPRO}DISASTER AT FLIXBOROUGH IN 1974.THE FIRE ENGINE HOLDS 400 GALLONS AND THE PRACTICE TOWER IS 15 METRES HIGH.EVERY THURSDAY THE MEN HAVE A PRACTICE AND THE FIRE ENGINE IS TAKEN OUT.IT TAKES ABOUT TWO MINUTES FOR THE ENGINE TO GET OUT OF THE STATION.
